alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Kimball (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 7:42PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Cheyenne and eastern Kimball Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 642 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kimball, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kimball around 645 PM MDT. Kimball Airport around 650 PM MDT. Dix around 705 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 15 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
